vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.14.13;
brother of: Mamre (H4471H) and Aner (H6063)
§ Eshcol = "cluster"
1) an area of Hebron, the valley of Eshcol
2) an Amorite, the brother of Mamre, dwelling in Hebron
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1)   racimo (por ejemplo, de uvas; FF 162,191); (2a)   amorita; (2b)   valle
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以實各 这个陽性專有名詞 地名在原文的意思是 "串束"
1) 希伯崙地區, 以實各山谷
2) 亞摩利人, 幔利的弟兄, 居住於希伯崙 (創14:13,24)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以实各 这个阳性专有名词 地名在原文的意思是 "串束"
1) 希伯仑地区, 以实各山谷
2) 亚摩利人, 幔利的弟兄, 居住于希伯仑 (创14:13,24)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Combined with na.chal (נַ֫חַל " Valley" H5158H)
§ Eshcol = "cluster"
This name is used for:
1) an area of Hebron, the valley of Eshcol
2) an Amorite, the brother of Mamre, dwelling in Hebron
